name: Dune Mimic
description: The Dune Mimic is a Huge monstrosity that disguises itself as ordinary sandy terrain, creating ambush opportunities. It has an amorphous form with adhesive properties to capture prey.
memorable: Its ability to imitate the environment and engulf enemies makes it a unique threat.
goals: Luring adventurers into its grasp and incapacitating them.
relations: May be encountered with other desert creatures or as a guardian of hidden treasures.
environment: Typically found in sandy deserts or arid regions.
strengths: Immunity to acid and fire damage; effective grappler with ambush abilities.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity makes it vulnerable to ranged attacks.
attacks: Utilizes three Pseudopod attacks that can deal significant bludgeoning damage, with the option to engulf foes.
most_powerful_ability: Engulf allows it to trap and harm creatures while restricting their movement and breathing.
senses: Possesses tremorsense up to 30 feet, allowing it to detect vibrations in the ground.
skills: Has a good passive Perception score of 14, enhancing its ambush capabilities.
additional_information: Can change shape to blend in with sandy environments.
Advantages on attack rolls against grappled creatures.
Can engulf multiple creatures at once.
Capable of hardening its surface to control who it grapples.
Remains motionless to disguise itself effectively.
test_queries: giant sand creature that can engulf
grappling ambusher that is immune to fire
